name: Global Conference on Management and Economics
content: Join us for an enriching experience at the Global Conference on Management and Economics, to be held from November 15th to 17th, 2024, in the captivating city of Athens, Greece. This conference presents a unique knowledge-sharing platform tailored for professionals, academics, and students eager to delve deeper into the intricacies of modern economic trends and management practices. Why Attend? • Global Networking: Engage with a diverse international audience, fostering new connections and partnerships that transcend borders. • Target Participants: This conference welcomes professionals, researchers, scholars, and students from various sectors, creating a dynamic and multifaceted learning environment. • Publication Opportunities: Showcase your research and insights through publication in esteemed Scopus index journals and conference proceedings, amplifying the reach and impact of your work. • Presentation Formats: Share your expertise through oral, virtual, or poster presentations, providing diverse avenues for knowledge dissemination. • Professional Development: Gain valuable experience and enhance your resume by participating in this esteemed conference, an asset to your career growth. • City Tour: Immerse yourself in the rich history of Athens with a complimentary guided city tour, offering a delightful blend of learning and leisure. • Invitation Letter: Receive an official invitation letter to facilitate your participation in this esteemed event. Don't miss this unparalleled opportunity to engage with industry leaders, expand your network, and contribute to the global discourse on management and economics. Secure your spot today and embark on a transformative journey of learning and collaboration.
